mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cart_count, product_id, member_id) values (#{cartCount}, #{productId}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.cart_status , c.cart_count , c.product_id , c.member_id , c.created_date , c.updated_date , p.product_name , p.product_price from tbl_cart c join tbl_member m on c.member_id = m.id join tbl_product p on c.product_id =p.id where c.member_id=#{memberId}
